IRS990.Desc: HALL RENTAL ACTIVITIES - RENTING THE PREMISES TO OTHERS FOR PRODUCTION OF EDUCATIONAL AND ARTISTIC EVENTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: PRODUCTION ACTIVITIES - TOWN HALL PRODUCED EDUCATIONAL AND ARTISTIC EVENTS AND PROGRAMS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 2: Description of Business or Family Relationship of Officers, Directors, Et
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MARVIN LEFFLER, PRESIDENT EMERITUS AND BRUCE LEFFLER, VICE PRESIDENT. FATHER/SON.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11b: Form 990 Review Process
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE PRESIDENT, CHAIRMAN OF THE FINANCE COMMITTEE, CHAIRMAN OF THE AUDIT COMMITTEE AND CHAIRMAN OF THE LEGAL COMMITTEE. IT IS THEN DISTRIBUTED TO THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION FOLLOWS THE PROCEDURES LISTED IN ITS CONFLICTS OF INTEREST POLICY STATEMENT TO MONITOR AND DETECT POTENTIAL CONFLICTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15b: Compensation Review and Approval Process for Officers and Key Employees
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: OFFICERS ARE NOT COMPENSATED. KEY EMPLOYEES ARE SUBJECT TO REVIEW BY BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990 - ORGANIZATION'S MISSION OR MOST SIGNIFICANT ACTIVITIES
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S PRIMARY MISSION AND PURPOSE IS THE SUPPORT AND PRESERVATION OF THE TOWN HALL, A NATIONAL HISTORIC LANDMARK BUILDING OF HISTORIC SIGNIFICANCE. THIS IS ACCOMPLISHED WITH THE PRESENTATION OF EDUCATIONAL AND ARTISTIC EVENTS IN THE BUILDING'S AUDITORIUM AND IN PUBLIC SCHOOLS.
